title: What can I do in File Manager?
content:
There are Owned, Shared, and Public folders.

Owned: holds the files you uploaded or generated using ETC tools.

Shared: holds the files other users have shared with you.

Public: holds any files ETC users made public.

You can:

  • Upload files
  • Create input files for Text Capture
  • Contribute term categorization results to OTO
  • Download selected files/folders
  • Delete selected files/folders

Each project should have a folder, do not mix files and folders in one folder.

title: Upload files
content:
If you have files that are suitable for ETC tools to process, you can upload them.
  1. Add a new folder by selecting Owned and clicking on Add Folder. Each project should have a folder, do not mix files and folders in one folder.
  2. Select file type to be uploaded in the drop-down selection.
  3. Click on Upload files. You can zip multiple files and upload the zipped file. The zipped file should not contain any folders.

title: Create input files for Text Capture
content:
Text Capture requires input files be in a specific format.
  1. Select a folder in Owned to hold the uploaded files.
  2. Click on Create Input for Text Capture and follow the instructions.

title: Contribute term categorization results to OTO
content: The terms you categorized for the ETC tool can be used by wider communities if you contribute your categorizations to <a href=

>OTO.
  1. Select a folder with TermsReviewed in its name.
  2. Click on Contribute to OTO and follow the instructions there.
    • If the button is not active, go to My Account under main Menu to enable/set up the link to OTO.
